name: LifeRing Secular Recovery
description: Founded in 2001, LifeRing Secular Recovery is a network of support groups for people who want to live free of alcohol and illicit or non-medically indicated drugs.
fullDescription: Founded in 2001, LifeRing Secular Recovery is a network of support groups for people who want to live free of alcohol and illicit or non-medically indicated drugs.
whatTheyOffer: Founded in 2001, LifeRing Secular Recovery is a network of support groups for people who want to live free of alcohol and illicit or non-medically indicated drugs.
address: 1 Dr. Carlton B. Goodlett Place, San Francisco, CA, 94102
